resources.string:
A simple app to learn CAD Customization."
"In this app, one can learn the basics of NX Open Customization and how to create features and other geometrics using NX Open APIâ€™s."
""
"For Better understanding we have provided some sample codes."
""
" So, before you start, make sure you know the basics of C# and Oops concepts."
""
" Enjoy the App!

NX Open is an Application Programming Interface (API) that lets you write programs to customize or extend NX."
" The benefit is that applications created this way can often speed up repetitive tasks, and capture important design process knowledge."
""
"
There is a broad range of NX Open functions, which provide capabilities like"
""
"
1.Creating part geometry, assemblies, drawings, and CAE and CAM objects"
""
" 2.Cycling through the objects in a part file, reading information or performing various operations on them"
""
" 3.Creating custom user interfaces that allow users to select objects and enter data"
""
" Some typical applications of these functions are:"
""
" 1.Creating part geometry or drawings according to your local standards"
""
" 2.Importing data from other sources, outside of NX"
""
" 3.Reading data from objects in a part file, and writing it out in some form of report"
""
" 4.Building custom applications to make processes faster or easier to understand"
"

Programming Knowledge :"
""
"
This Application uses only C# for examples. "
""
" But any basic knowledge on below languages are good enough to start NX open Customization ,"
" "
"
C#,"
" VB.Net"
" JAVA,"
" Python "
" "
"
To kick start NX open customization ,we need the following software's. "
" "
" NX Version : 11.0 or 12.0"
" "
"
IDE: Visual Studio 2015 or above(Express/Profession Edition)"
" "
"
.NET Framework : 4.6 (Recommended)"
" "
"
OS: Windows 7 or 10"
" "
"
Hardware Requirements:"
" "
"
Graphics card : 2 GB( Nvidia)"
" "
"
RAM: 8GB ,16GB(Recommended), 64-bit (x64) processor"
" "
"
Screen Resolution: 1280 x 1024 or higher, widescreen format"
" "
"
